author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-United Natural Foods Says COO Will Retire On Oct 1
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - United Natural Foods Inc:
* UNITED NATURAL FOODS, INC. ANNOUNCES ORGANIZATIONAL CHANGES
* UNITED NATURAL FOODS-SEAN GRIFFIN, CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER, WILL TRANSITION FROM HIS CURRENT ROLE ON AUGUST 1, 2018 AND RETIRE FROM COMPANY ON OCT 1 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
